package.name: VeraCrypt
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGNAME}_${PKGVERSION}/src jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi export PATH=/usr/compat.new/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/compat.new/bin:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH make -j $jobcount || exit 0 convert ./Setup/Linux/usr/share/pixmaps/veracrypt.xpm -resize '48x48!' ./Setup/Linux/usr/share/pixmaps/veracrypt.png sed -i 's%Categories=Encryption;Encryption Tools;Utility;%Categories=Utility;Encryption;Encryption Tools;%g' ./Setup/Linux/usr/share/applications/veracrypt.desktop echo '===> searching files' find . -type f | sort
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGNAME}_${PKGVERSION}/src mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share tar -C ./Setup/Linux/ -cvf - . | tar -C ${TGTDIR}/ -xf - ln -sf veracrypt ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/truecrypt rm veracrypt ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/veracrypt-uninstall.sh
